name: Cat chaos (cuencaad)
description:
You just got up from your seventh nap of the day and feel that necessity to mess with everything in your environment.

Really you feel relief from destroying everything…? 

Of course! You are a cat , now stop asking questions and let your inner cat do the work.

Controls:

-Move with WASD and overlap the items to interact with them.

This is a game project for class but i have intention to add more levels and even a little history that give you some context for the world and why you are doing what you doing. 

Thanks for playing it!
